name: 喬愛淳
objective:
1.　　能使用漢語拼音。 
Be able to use Hanyu Pinyin System.
2.　　具備認讀漢字之能力，以及學會漢字的結構、筆順及寫法。 
Have the ability to recognize and read Chinese characters, and to learn the structure, stroke orders and writing of Chinese characters.
3.　　了解華語基本文法、語序及架構。 
Learn basic Chinese grammar, word order and structure.
4.　　具備使用華語自我介紹、認識朋友、買東西等日常會話之能力。
Have the ability to have daily conversation in Chinese to give self-introduction, to make friends, and to go shopping, etc.
